com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.mojo

Class RunMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractServerMojo
        • com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractRunMojo
          • com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb.mojo.RunMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.Logger, com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.MonitorObserver, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="run",
      defaultPhase=PRE_INTEGRATION_TEST)
public final class RunMojo
extends com.btmatthews.utils.monitor.mojo.AbstractRunMojo
    This plug-in Mojo starts an In Memory Database.
    Version:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    Brian Matthews
